job_name: LoveFu - 品牌社群經營小編
cust_name: 艾利臻企業有限公司
job_detail:
來到LoveFu，你會擔任的角色：
富有情感面，又不失理性的一個人，能理解消費者在想些什麼，能運用有邏輯且有知性的文字，傳遞品牌的溫度與價值。潤物細無聲的方式，進入到每一個人們的家中，「讓世界樂眠」是我們的願景，也將是你在這裡的目標。

【主要工作內容】
1. 對新媒體社群經營充滿熱情，並熟知各類社群平台（FB、FB社團、IG、LINE等）操作與經營模式。
2. 平台內容經營：品牌相關素材蒐集、撰寫文案、粉絲互動、規劃並執行社群企劃等。
3. 媒體採買（KOL、部落客、其他媒體）。
4. 進行後台數據分析。
5. 其他主管交辦之事項。

【我們希望你具備的經驗與特質】
1. 至少有1年以上的寫手經驗，文章能引人入勝。
2. 樂於挑戰各種不熟悉的事物並能舉一反三，不因挫折而輕易放棄。
3. 了解各類社群服務，能很好的掌握時下趨勢 。
4. 具備很強的市場感知能力，能敏銳的把握市場動態和方向 。
5. 團隊文化以目標導向為主，須具備邏輯思維與溝通協調能力。
6. 大膽嘗試且執行力強。
7. 公司會因應市場環境快速迭代，目標或執行方向隨之調整，做人做事須隨時保持彈性。

* 若您有以下能力，會為自己帶來加分：
1. 曾經在電商或其他品牌公司工作。
2. 投放廣告經驗（FB、ADS）
3. 有美編設計的工作經驗
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
skill: 社群媒體經營管理, 廣告企劃案╱文案撰寫

job_name: LoveFu - 數位行銷經理【桃園】
cust_name: 艾利臻企業有限公司
job_detail:
來到LoveFu，你會擔任的角色：
富有情感面，又不失理性的一個人，能理解消費者在想些什麼，能運用有邏輯且有知性的文字，傳遞品牌的溫度與價值。潤物細無聲的方式，進入到每一個人們的家中，「讓世界樂眠」是我們的願景，也將是你在這裡的目標。

【主要工作內容】
1. 根據公司策略目標，制定符合品牌文化價值觀的行銷策略達到目標
2. 根據公司目標、市場特性和成本及利潤的考量，來發展和評估銷售或推廣策略。
3. 評估產品開發的行銷預算及計劃（如：分派預算額度、預測投資報酬及損益情形）。
4. 使用銷售預測和策略性計畫來確保產品、生產線或服務的銷售及可獲利性，分析商業發展並監控市場趨勢。
5. 與開發業者、廣告業者以及業務、廣告、行銷經理共同規劃、指導和協調行銷活動及策略，以促銷產品和服務。
6 負責行銷人員的雇用、訓練及績效評估並監督並領導他們日常工作。

【我們需要的工作經驗】
5年以上數位行銷經驗
3年以上電商產業經驗
3年以上待過品牌公司
2年以上主管職經驗
熟悉品牌情感面操作、電商與實體門市業態、並具備領導能力者適合
(以上時間是可以重複)

【我們需要的人格特質】
1. 數據分析能力、顧客與市場洞察的能力
2. 不斷會追求卓越，自我成長與反思的能力：不斷在嘗試新的事物與挑戰不同的事情
3. 擁抱變化，保有彈性與面對挫折的抗壓性與應變能力：可帶領團隊跳脫出舒適圈的魄力與勇氣，也有嘗試不斷優化策略的精神。沒有最好，只有更好。
4. 溝通能力：不管是對上溝通或是對下溝通都是我們非常看重的能力；能與不同的利益關係者達到有效正面溝通的協調力，共同想出更好的方案與對策，並取出好的成果。

【工作環境與團隊特色介紹】
1. 辦公室環境開闊，組織扁平，行銷靈感開放，絕對有落地執行的機會。
2. 團隊間所有決策皆有數據作為依據，從數據出發，發想優化與執行的方式，而非只靠感覺。
3. 態度開放：每個人都有高度落實心中想法的機會，只要是好的提案，並且擁有明確的目標和想達到的成果（如果能用數據佐證就更好囉）就放手一搏吧！

最後我們不只是看績效，我們更看重認同我們LoveFu文化與價值觀的人。

*薪資可面談，看具體能力與價值
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
specialty: Excel, Word, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Trend
skill: 品牌行銷管理, 異業合作規劃與執行, 提案與簡報技巧, 網站企劃能力, 網路活動規劃與執行, 行銷宣傳預算編製與控管, 行銷策略擬定, 品牌知名度推廣, 社群媒體經營管理, 市場調查企劃與執行, 網站流量成效追蹤, 廣告企劃案╱文案撰寫, 廣告效益評估, 廣告創意發想與提案

3. 針對客戶提出的合約（交易條件、生產流程、產品要求、售後服務）作初步評估，並在必要時尋求其他部門協助，以即時回應客戶需求。

10. 跟催維修品&品異報告回覆以提供良好的售後服務。
11. 充當客戶與各部門間的橋樑，以達成溝通協調目的。

1. 負責進貨驗收、進貨入倉、清點盤存、庫存記錄、補貨上架…倉庫相關事務。 
2.協助外包裝相關工作。 
3.動線配置規劃、倉庫整理、倉庫整潔。 
4.主管交代事項。 
5.協助各部門溝通事宜。 
6.具獨立作業能力。 
7.需細心、有責任感，誠徵有倉管經驗者佳
8.熟悉ERP系統及相關OA軟體。
 
二、本職專業技能訴求：
1. 需細心核對進/出貨單。 
2. 需對自己要求工作效率及速度。 
3. 簡易的電腦基本操作。 
 
三、個人特質訴求： 
1. 我們重視團隊合作與互動，因此具備團隊合作精神是必要的。 
2. 要細心有耐性，要有解決問題之態度
 
應徵學歷有高中職以上即可，畢業科系不拘 
有責任感且願意吃苦耐勞。

四、福利概要：
1. 保險類：勞保、健保。 
2. 休閒類：上班日皆供午餐，組長會統一訂餐。 
3. 休假制度：周休二日、見紅就休。 
4. 薪資：基本薪資 
5. 年終獎金 : 視公司營運狀況


工作資訊
工作時間： 日班9:00-17:00
休假制度： 固定休六、日（見紅就休）
工作待遇： 月薪 2.8萬 
工作性質： 全職
職務類別： 倉儲物流人員  、 包裝員／作業員
工作地點：桃園市八德區建國路741巷29號
 
要求條件
工作經驗：不拘
學歷限制：不拘
科系限制：不拘

【本職缺有升遷機會，公司規模逐漸況展，願意栽培主管職缺】 
所有要學的事務並不複雜，也不會特別難,所以沒有特別要求學歷 
主要是有心 並且對自工作能夠自我要求。

大溪關公文化園區相關活動企劃及推廣事務,(住宿.宗教.觀光.商場)及整合媒體的架設~推動品牌曝光與公司相關政策~

▍工作內容：
－制定網路行銷年度計劃、內容經營策略及行動方針
－行銷預算管理、年度業績目標達成
－團隊管理、流程建立與優化
－網路行銷及檔期促銷活動規劃、執行及成效追蹤
－線上線下通路開發
－蒐集分析市場上競品狀況，並研擬因應策略
－數位廣告管理、數據研究分析

▍應徵條件
1.具備行銷主管經驗三年以上
2.溝通表達能力佳，邏輯清晰且具商業思維
3.目標導向，重視品質與成效
4.具備品牌官網、電商促銷操作運營及會員運營經驗
5.具整合分析能力(譬如：行銷策略分析及消費者行為分析)
6.具備網路行銷企劃經驗、網站經營管理、社群經營經驗，熟悉網路行銷工具(必須熟悉SEO、GA) 

【必備資料】
行銷專案、企劃等相關工作作品集
edu: 高中以下、高中、專科、大學
skill: 品牌行銷管理, 實體活動規劃與執行, 網站企劃能力, 網路活動規劃與執行, 行銷宣傳預算編製與控管, 行銷策略擬定, 品牌知名度推廣, 社群媒體經營管理, 網站流量成效追蹤, 廣告效益評估, 廣告創意發想與提案
other:
1.需對宗教文化有一定程度興趣了解，關聖帝君為主軸。
2.需肯配合宗教重大節日或活動行程出差。
3.了解社群網路平台品牌推廣曝光以及抖音、直播的經驗為優先。

9. 根據尺寸、重量、顏色或其他規格將產品分類和分級。

job_name: Oversea Recruiter 海外招募專員
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
Supermicro is looking for a oversea Recruiter to join our Human Resources team and support the ongoing recruiting efforts. In this position, you will have the opportunity to utilize your hands-on experience as a full life-cycle Recruiter, facilitate the end-to-end recruiting activities and drive the requisitions from open to close. This role will focus on both technical and non-technical hiring with deep talent sourcing focus.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
• Source and build candidate pipelines for oversea positions, coordinate and schedule phone screen and on-site interviews, facilitate the overall interview process high quality
• Proactively identifies and recruits passive candidates while maintaining long-term relationships with them
• Leverage multiple sourcing strategies and channels, and internal referrals to provide high quality candidates for open positions
• Collaborate with compensation team to design competitive compensation package
• Drives achievement of the hiring targets, including time to fill, cost per hire, university hiring and diversity goals
• Build a strong partnerships across various functions with hiring managers, executive team and HR team
• Establish relationships with local colleges and universities and attend career fairs

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary: 
This person will use the Adobe CS platform to write, revise, and create Intel motherboard user manuals, quick reference guides, and other product-related user guides as assigned. This person will maintain documentation detailing the revision history of each manual and user guide.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities
1. The duties and responsibilities for this position include, but are not limited to, the following:
2. Interacting with engineers and other tech writers to obtain technical data, schematics, and drawings for manual production
3. Writing, revising, completing user manuals, quick reference guides, and user guides as assigned
4. Using graphics tools to create/modify illustration drawings, product images, and technical graphics to be used in technical documentation 
5. Providing assistance and support to a senior technical writer in maintaining user manuals for Intel motherboard and other hardware-related projects
6. Keeping records that document revisions of all manuals and user documents
7. Submitting daily report, weekly status report, and weekly team project update report for review
8. Providing support to other technical writers, engineers, and sales when needed
9. Following instructions and carrying out duties as instructed by product managers, engineers, and the team manager.

**Only applicants with English resume will be considered, please submit/attach your English resume when applying this job.

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
Supermicro is looking for stellar engineers to join our command center team. In this role, you will serve as the first point of contact, utilize your technical knowledge and help address inquiries via phone, e-mail, web portal on our products, solutions, and services. You will also partner with cross-functional engineering teams to understand the latest technology, and translate the technical specifications to common language for the clients.
This role will be based in the headquarters located in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
Duties and Responsibilities:
- Serve as first point of contact and address to customer’s inquiries and questions regarding to Supermicro products, solutions, and services
- Act as pre and post sales liaison between field and cross-functional product management teams
- Identify, document, and resolve customer issues; escalate critical customer’s questions and issues to the correspondent team and management
- Assisting clients to perform basic troubleshooting via phone, e-mail, or web portal 
- Provide inputs to designing team on customer’s feedback on new products improvement
- Provide technical support over the phone/or web to customers on hardware and software issues
- Drive customer satisfaction through service excellence
- Ability to work two shift rotation (9:00~18:00; 13:00~22:00)

job_name: Sr. Thermal Engineer/資深熱傳工程師-TC220219
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
• With good experience of system thermal design in server/storage/blade system platform. 
• Good ODM/OEM system thermal design knowledge for server solution and industry design standards 
• Support system PM to evaluate/review system thermal design details, including power consumptions, air flow, solution characteristics, temperature sensors and related design validation of system thermals.
• Familiar with thermal design process/analysis in component level and system level.  Characteristic definition of thermal solution, design testing skill (including chamber test set up, thermocouple installation, automated data acquisition), system thermal issue debugging, optimization and report documentation.
• With experience in manufacturing and qualification process of thermal solution/parts.
• Provide identification and creation of new techniques to advance thermal development and validation is a plus.
major: 工程學科類 工業技藝及機械學科類
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
• Bachelor’s degree in Aerospace, Thermal or Mechanical Engineering discipline and Master's degree in engineering is a plus.
• At least 5 years experience in server/storage/blade ODM/OEM design and validation.  8+ years experience is preferred.  
• Require server knowledge/experience of system design process and thermal design/management, heat transfer material, cooling devices.
• Strong organizational, problem solving, solid communication skills in both verbal and written.

job_name: 【八德、桃園、中壢】居家清潔人員，業界最高320時薪，假日時薪加成40元 ~ 彈性排班/無經驗可/雙週領薪/時間彈性 休假自已安排/免經驗(雙周領)

無經驗可，檸檬會從頭教起，提供完整教育訓練+實習，只要你有一顆刻苦耐勞的心
檸檬專業清潔秉持著”愛您家，如己家”的理念，用心服務每一位客戶。

◆工作地點：八德區、桃園區、中壢區周邊
◆工作內容 : 到府服務，居家清潔
★時間彈性，自行安排可上班時間，能兼顧家庭、生活，但需事先一個月前排班。

✮高額激勵獎金制度 :
超高時薪之外，還有額外獎金：
1.VIP獎金最高400元
2.每季激勵獎金，單次最高獎金1500元。
3.介紹獎金，揪親朋好友一起工作，獎金1000元。

✮完整教育訓練系統 : 
新人訓練課程、實務課程，幫助您成為專業家事達人，每月例會教育訓練增進專業技能。 

✮服務品質最佳 : 
經客戶回饋五星評價，成為令人尊重的檸檬清潔專業家事達人，顛覆傳統刻板印象。 

✮2人一組，保障個人安全 : 
除此之外還有意外險加保，讓您人身安全多個保障。 

✮儲備幹部培訓 : 
藉由工作中培養個人能力與特質，提供想與公司一起追求成長的夥伴一個良好的平台。 

✮不定期員工聚會 : 
檸檬清潔最重視大家庭的和諧，期待您的加入帶給公司更正面、更積極的影響。 

若你對檸檬有興趣，歡迎投遞履歷，我們會盡快與你聯繫 

◆不接受與其他同業有承攬或雇傭之關係。


【為什麼要加入檸檬專業清潔？】
或許清潔服務不會是你工作的首選，大家對於居家清潔持有傳統印象，許多人投入之後便會發現，與想像中有落差，這工作比自已在家做家事還需更仔細，更專業，能學到一技之長，根據經驗，了解不同材質、污垢的清潔方式，也可以看到客戶滿意的笑容，有成就感的工作，自由度高，下班能吃到各區美食

As a global leader in high performance, high efficiency server technology and innovation, we develop
and provide end-to-end green computing solutions to the data center, cloud computing, enterprise IT, big
data, HPC, and embedded markets.The candidate will play a key role in the development process of inhouse
server motherboards, by working collaboratively with cross-functional engineering team as well as

expected to be self-motivated and possess a strong will to do great things, with result-driven mindset to
develop the most competitive and endurance board products.

card products.

PM/Purchaser/Layout/LAB/BIOS/SW/ME/Compliance/Thermal/Production to discover and solve any engineering
issues in early stage to ensure and enhance the quality of the products.
• Create technical documentation including products specifications, layout instructions, test procedures, etc.
• Resolve complicated issues and drive to root cause on critical engineering problems.
• Provide the clear documents and strong technical supports to the contract manufacturers and production
department during the product sample and production stages
• Short term business trip to support HQ project when needed.
• Project maintenance.

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
Individuals in this role are expected to be comfortable working with voluminous data, structured and un-unstructured, and have a foundation in mathematical statistics.   The ideal candidate will have a keen interest for transforming internal audit by using data science to identify and answer questions that help us measure business risk and the control environment.
The Data Analytics (Assistant) Manager will lead the following practices:
•	Develop and carryout the process of obtaining, organizing, and delivering data requests and analytics for various Internal Audit projects, cybersecurity, and assessments of financial reporting risk in connection with SOX 404 compliance.
•	Integrate analytic results and metrics with a Governance, Risk and Compliance platform such as Diligent HighBond system
•	Evaluate and communicate results of analytics for various levels of management
•	Develop training and instruct others in designing data analytics  

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
•	Work closely with internal auditors to identify and answer important questions, learn from data and tell the story related to business risk.
•	Manage data from multiple sources, validate data for completeness and accuracy, analyze outliers:
-	Extract: Drive the collection of new data and the refinement of existing data sources 
-	Validate: Develop data management ability to prepare data for analysis
-	Analyze and interpret the results of ongoing assessments by isolating process-based leading indicators and symptomatic lagging indicators.
•	Design solutions with appropriate statistical techniques on structured and unstructured data
•	Visualize and Communicate results and recommendations to auditors, compliance functions and management
• Innovate professional practices for using data analysis and continuous auditing to provide assurance. 

Qualifications:
•	Certified as CISA, CIA or CFE (or equivalent)
•	Four-year degree and M.S. in a relevant technical field, or 5+ years’ experience in a relevant role
•	Financial or operational audit experience is preferred   
•	Extensive experience solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches 
•	Comfortable with manipulating and analyzing complex, high-volume nonfinancial and transactional data from varying sources
•	A strong passion for research, for answering strategic questions and telling the story regarding business risk with data 
•	Ability to communicate complex quantitative analysis in a clear, precise, and actionable manner 
•	Familiarity with relational databases, SQL and data visualization with PowerBI
•	Expert knowledge of analysis tools such as R or ACL
•	Experience working with large data sets and distributed computing tools

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
<Summary>
This position works directly with multiple teams to support the development and implementation of a proactive Quality Management System (QMS), Environmental Management System (EMS), and Information Security Management System (ISMS) in compliance with ISO 9001 / 13485 / 14001 / 27001 globally. This includes the creation, training, deployment, auditing, and maintenance of the global Management Systems.
The QS Manager will provide leadership in the implementation, maintenance, and improvement of company-wide QMS, EMS, and ISMS. Proactively monitors the various elements of the management system to help ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and applicable national and international standards. 

<Essential Duties and Responsibilities>
*	Manage and coordinate ISO-related activities (e.g. Internal and external audits, management review meetings), and projects across multiple teams and departments.
*	Continuously create, review, update, improve and maintain the department processes and documents for improvement. 
*	Coordinate responses to any applicable audit findings to an effective Corrective and Preventive Action (CAPA) internally and externally. 
*	Develop an internal audit program including planning, implementation, report generation, corrective action issuance to closure.
*	Plan and conduct training on key elements of the QMS, EMS, and ISMS, including CAPA, Complaint Handling, and Internal Audit.
*	Streamline and improve internal controls and processes for continuous improvement.   
*	Plan and execute projects and complete other duties as assigned.


<Qualifications>
*	Bachelor’s degree in industrial management, business, IT, or equivalent field or work experience. 
*	Minimum of 3 years relevant experience in hardware, software, electronics engineering or manufacturing or related field.
*	Strong knowledge of ISO International Standards (e.g. ISO 9001, 13485, 14001, & 27001) is a plus. 
*	Hands-on experience in implementation and management of QMS / EMS is preferable.
*	Superior communication skills. Must be able to communicate and articulate thoughts and ideas clearly and concisely both verbally and in writing.
*	Excellent presentation skills (articulate and persuasive); demonstrated good English written and verbal skills.
*	Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
*	Strong interpersonal skills and ability to build cross-functional teams and manage multi-tasked activities concurrently.

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Job Summary:
Technology Enablement Group at Supermicro is seeking a Technical Business Development Specialist for Japan, liaisoning other APAC areas. The ideal candidate will have a blend of solution engineering, including solution definition and execution of various workloads, technical pre-sales, partner relations, and project management reporting to the headquarters in San Jose. 
This TBD role for the Technology Enablement Team is a result-oriented goal-achiever to uncover business opportunities with SMCI cybersecurity plug-and-play total solutions in Japan and other APAC countries by identifying and developing tier 1 resellers and account relations; executing critical projects, and managing relationships with partners and customers to maximize the growth opportunities under the HQ initiatives.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 
•Introduce New SMCI Cybersecurity total solutions to Japanese ecosystem partners and build the new sales revenue models in cooperation with the local engineering, sales, and marketing teams by assessing and identifying the business needs, ROI, and value proposition to deploy and execute. 
•Represents the voice of the HQ, present the new cybersecurity total solutions to Japan's market, and ensures the plan is well-executed through 
•With a start-up mentality, identify the opportunities for partnerships in the market through insights into the tech industry.
•Execution focused on building and maintaining a network of business relationships, including the C-Level executive management of resellers, partner clients,  and other referral resources 
•Engage the local engineering, sales, and marketing teams to ensure the product roadmap is competitive in the market.
•Work closely with HQ & local technical teams to ensure clients' expectations and requirements are incorporated into the new platform 
•Show excellent communications skills in Japanese and English and the ability to persuade. Present our sophisticated concepts in a completing, concise, and creating way. 
•Supply Chain Leader: responsible for supplementing global data with local insights to optimize the local sales orders with EOL and supply chain analysis. 
•Assesses and pursues Japan market opportunities and trends for the specialists that provide opportunities for partners/customers to leverage Supermicro solutions/products by identifying, quantifying, and qualifying opportunities in cooperation with the internal support from the local engineering, sales, and marketing teams. 
•Ensure strategic deals incorporate relevant Japan's market factors (e.g., competitive, economic, industry-specific) to contribute to optimal results and return on investment
•Identify the appropriate executive-level stakeholder within customers, resellers, and partners to connect and work with in cooperation with Business Development and pursuit of new business generation. 
•Report HQ daily, and monthly presentation is tasked.

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Supermicro is seeking a Product Manager who can lead the development and integration of chassis products for automotive embedded system. This is a key product management role focused on Embedded product solutions where communication among remote teams and on-site product leadership for our development teams is critical to develop and enable operations to fulfill roadmap expectation. In addition to developing new top-of-the-line systems, product manager is expected to collaborate with marketing and sales departments to promote products and interact with customers directly to sell these products. As a product manager, you will use strong technical and communication skills towards product definition strategy for Supermicro's core product family including research into vertical-based customer solutions and creation of aggressive go-to market plan. Ultimately, Product Manager will become a core member of the Server Product Management team and engage in technical, product development, marketing, and pre/post-sales support activities.

- Develop and manage the product life cycle of Embedded chassis products, including product development phase: product conception, specification, scheduling, prototyping, tooling; as well as mass production phase: product support and maintenance of the entire product life cycle.
- Create and present chassis product roadmap.
- Closely work with engineering teams to review the product specification and design of chassis mechanical, thermal, system architecture to enable competitive, high quality embedded chassis product.
- Lead cross-functional team to ensure time-to-market product launch and on-time delivery.
- Closely work with oversea ODM vendor on server chassis product design and development, design review, chassis parts tooling fabrication and production ramp-up, set-up.
- Work with marketing & sales on new chassis products launch and promotion.

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary:
As a global leader for networking solution innovation, Super Micro Computer's mission is to develop and provide the market with end-to end computing solution and high performance networking products. The candidate will play a key role in the development process of in-house server motherboards, by working collaboratively with cross-functional engineering team as well as outside partners to ensure the robust design of the boards. As a (Sr.) Hardware Design Manager, you are expected to be self-motivated and possess a strong will to do great things, with result-driven mindset to develop the most competitive and endurance board products.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Includes the following essential duties and responsibilities (other duties may also be assigned):
• Responsible for schematics capture, layout checking, BOM generating, and debugging and testing of server motherboards / add-on cards / backplane products
• Collaborate with layout engineers, validation engineers, software engineers, firmware engineers, product engineers and other teams to discover and solve any engineering issues in early stage to ensure and enhance the quality of the products
• Prepare technical documentation including product specifications, layout instructions, test procedures, etc.
• Accomplish the products to conform to engineering specifications, EMC and energy regulations, and customer performance expectations
• Provide the clear documents and strong technical supports to the contract manufacturers and production department during the product sample and production stages
other:
• Master's degree in electrical engineering with 7 years or Bachelor with 10 years of experience working with x86 server / workstation boards is preferred
• Deep understanding of x86 architecture; Comprehensive knowledge on the PCB layout, debugging tools and software, oscilloscope, logic analyzer, etc.
• In-depth knowledge of PCB layout, OrCAD/Allegro tools, circuit design, and PCB structure
• Knowledge of high speed circuit design and voltage regular circuit design
• Familiar with digital scope and high speed bus measurement
• Excellent organizational skills, problem solving capability, and strong ability to adopt and learn new notion and technologies
• Self-motivated and enthusiastic on working in fast-paced environment

job_name: 18_SAR測試工程師_早/中/大夜班 (桃園)
cust_name: 台灣歐陸檢驗科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
人體電磁波能量吸收率(Specific Absorption Rate)，由於手機或無線產品普遍使用，造成人體暴露於無線通訊產品的無線電波底下，過量的電磁輻射會影響人體健康，因此這方面愈來愈受到重視。
SAR 在進行模擬測試時會使用到標準規範的組織液、模擬人體的 Phantom、高精密設備的探測器具，在軟體計算後將電磁波依數據化方式呈現，呈現出來的數據依照各國法規規範進行判斷。

職務要求
1- 根據各國法規執行 SAR 測試內容。
2- 測試數據資料依照需求整理。
3- 主管交辦事項。
4- 工作地點：桃園八德_歐陸電子通訊檢測

Specific Absorption Rate (SAR) refers to radio frequency electromagnetic field absorbed by the human body while 
using wireless products, and the exceeding exposure is considered that might cause the potential effect on human 
health. 
Given the popularization of mobile phones or wireless products, this subject is attached importance gradually. 
The SAR testing implements with standard tissue liquid, human-simulated phantom and high-precision detectors. 
The acquired results present in digitization after software calculation, then perform data analysis in compliance with relevant standards and regulations. 

Duties and Responsibilities: 
1- To perform SAR Testing in accordance with relevant standards. 
2- Recording and organizing test result by following department’s requests. 
3- Help superiors with other required tasks.

job_name: 【可研發替代役】 Cyber Security 軟體工程師（資安-模糊測試）-TC20690
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
This Software Engineer position is responsible for performing security testing against Supermicro products such as BIOS, BMC firmware, and other software utilities. This position should be able to do reverse engineering, dynamic analysis, static code analysis, fuzz testing, and vulnerability analysis.
 
Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:
1.	Conduct reverse-engineering for known and suspected executable files that were packed into firmware, through the use of static and dynamic software analysis tools, including disassemblers, debuggers, virtual machines, hex editors, and un-packers.
2.	Produce a reports that roughly decribe the functionalies and design logic of a executble file.
3.	Keep software security related kwonledge up to date from time to time.
4.	Develop and research automated vulnerability detection technology.
5.	Support the maintenance of software analysis platforms and tool sets.
 

#逆向工程 #資訊安全 #滲透測試 #漏洞評估 #cybersecurity #模糊測試 #動態分析 #Fuzztesting #Fuzz
major: 資訊工程相關 其他工程相關 資訊管理相關
other:
Qualifications:
1.	Bachelor's degree in computer engineering, computer science, or other closely related IT discipline.
2.	Working knowledge of compiler & OS loader.
3.	Demonstrated experience writing code (C, C++, Python, Perl, Java, Powershell, Assembly language, etc.)
4.	Basic understanding of Windows Operating System or Linux Operating System.
5.	Basic understanding of the PE file format or ELF format.
6.	The potential of academic research or the ability to implement theoretical technology
7.	Familar with at least one of the following assembly language: MASM, TASM, NASM, GAS.
8.	Familar with at least one instruction set of following CPU: x86, AMD64(x86_64), A64(arm64), A32(arm32) and T32(thumb)
9. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
10. Secure coding practice experiences will be a plus

cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Supermicro® is a Top Tier provider of advanced server, storage, and networking solutions for Data Center, Cloud Computing, Enterprise IT, Hadoop/ Big Data, Hyperscale, HPC and IoT/Embedded customers worldwide. We are the #5 fastest growing company among the Silicon Valley Top 50 technology firms. Our unprecedented global expansion has provided us with the opportunity to offer a large number of new positions to the technology community. We seek talented, passionate, and committed engineers, technologists, and business leaders to join us.

The Technology Enablement department is formed by an experienced and dynamic team responsible for developing, integrating, and expanding new and existing solutions in the global IT market. The team focuses on enterprise GPU solutions, AI/ML, Cybersecurity, Liquid Cooling, and more.

The Technology Enablement Engineer will focus on enterprise data center products and solutions. The ideal candidate will be deeply interested in researching, architecting, and delivering new solutions and technologies to the team and Supermicro's customers. This position will be based in the newly finished Taiwan office located in Bade, Taoyuan. 

Responsibilities Include
•Understand Supermicro products, architecture, and integration components.
•Research new solutions, technologies, and IT-related topics based on management directions.
•Work closely with internal departments and technology partner companies.
•Participate in new projects to integrate, validate, test, and benchmark data center systems.
•Deliver studies and test findings through presentations and marketing documentation.
•Stay curious about emerging technology and keep aware of technology trends relevant to data centers.

A Successful Candidate Will Demonstrate
•Ability to manage and balance resources, promoting cost-effective solutions. 
•Fundamental knowledge of systems and network topologies.
•Interested in critical IT platforms such as cloud, virtualization, containers, and more.
•Organization, attention to detail, self-dependent, and adaptability.

job_name: Sr. Hardware Design Engineer  資深硬體設計工程師-TC21930
cust_name: Super Micro Computer, Inc._美超微電腦股份有限公司
job_detail:
Summary：
As a global leader for networking solution innovation, Super Micro Computer's mission is to develop and provide the market with end-to end computing solution and high performance networking products. The candidate will play a key role in the development process of in-house server motherboards, by working collaboratively with cross-functional engineering team as well as outside partners to ensure the robust design of the boards. As a Sr. Hardware Design Engineer, you are expected to be self-motivated and possess a strong will to do great things, with result-driven mindset to develop the most competitive and endurance board products.

Includes the following essential duties and responsibilities (other duties may also be assigned):
• Responsible for schematics capture, layout checking, BOM generating, and debugging and testing of server motherboards / add-on cards / backplane products
• Collaborate with layout engineers, validation engineers, software engineers, firmware engineers, product engineers and other teams to discover and solve any engineering issues in early stage to ensure and enhance the quality of the products
• Prepare technical documentation including product specifications, layout instructions, test procedures, etc.
• Accomplish the products to conform to engineering specifications, EMC and energy regulations, and customer performance expectations
• Provide the clear documents and strong technical supports to the contract manufacturers and production department during the product sample and production stages
other:
• Master's degree in electrical engineering with 3 years or Bachelor with 5 years of experience working with x86 server / workstation boards is preferred
• Deep understanding of x86 architecture; Comprehensive knowledge on the PCB layout, debugging tools and software, oscilloscope, logic analyzer, etc.
• In-depth knowledge of PCB layout, OrCAD/Allegro tools, circuit design, and PCB structure
• Knowledge of high speed circuit design and voltage regular circuit design
• Familiar with digital scope and high speed bus measurement
• Excellent organizational skills, problem solving capability, and strong ability to adopt and learn new notion and technologies
• Self-motivated and enthusiastic on working in fast-paced environment

您對於服務及跟群眾接觸有很高的興趣嗎?

【燦坤搭台~您來唱戲!敢無?】
新零售時代來臨提供線上購物實體守護的服務體驗，承諾線上線下一致的價格與優惠，以【3C專門家】提供顧客/會員滿意的消費體驗，員工築夢的最佳舞台，歡迎熱情、活力、積極、注重服務體驗、具有數位能力的您，一起加入TK3C，與我們打造新零售時代的TK3C，成就您與燦坤璀璨的黃金未來!

(1) 負責商品進出貨、銷售管理及庫存管理。

(3) 重點商品介紹、專區管理、目標達成。
3.門市管理執行:

(2) 創新商品陳列方式，展現門店特色。
(3) 商圈客群經營與行銷活動展開。
(4) 區域內活動與門市內同仁支援。

工作主要內容:
1.門市商品介紹及銷售
2.顧客接待與需求服務
3.商品庫存管理

福利制度:
◆法定項目
1. 勞保(全額公司吸收)
2. 健保(全額公司吸收)
3. 勞退6%新制
4. 年假
◆獎金、禮品類
1. 全勤獎金
2. 員工績效獎金/競賽獎金
3. 薦才獎金
4. 三節節慶禮品或禮券(春節、端午節、中秋節)
5. 婚喪喜慶補助
◆娛樂、補助類
1. 員工旅遊(每年度舉辦國內外旅遊)
2. 定期部門聚餐(含尾牙)/中秋烤肉會、聖誕節晚會、各式團康活動
3. 員工購物優惠
4. 提供舒適合身制服
◆津貼類
1. 主管津貼
2. 加班津貼
3. 遠距補助或提供宿舍
◆制度類
1. 每月業績達成獎金、單品銷售獎金、目標達成抽成獎金。
2. 人性化管理制度：鼓勵即時溝通、組織扁平化管理。
3. 培育人才，並輔導為內部創業老闆。
4. 完善的教育訓練 :
(1) 新進人員訓練
(2) 在職員工訓練／儲備幹部訓
(3) 每月邀請兩次原廠講師做專業知識訓練。
5. 舒適、安全與友善的工作環境
6. KPI績效考核制度
7. 暢通升遷管道
skill: 客戶資料更新維護, 櫃檯門市接待與需求服務, 產品介紹及解說銷售

cust_name: 哥雲數位文化有限公司
job_detail:
1. 協助公司文件之建檔、管理。
2. 負責郵件及內部文件之收發。
3. 協助處理庶務性行政工作（如：文具用品採買）。
4. 負責外出送件、物件寄送及簡易銀行業務處理。
5. 負責電話接聽及顧客問題解答。
6. 支援會議行政工作（如：會議前置茶水準備）。
7. 負責辦公室環境與設備之清潔與維護。
8. 支援各部門的業務及活動。
skill: 文件收發與檔案管理, 文書處理╱排版能力, 行政事務處理, 電話接聽與人員接待事項, 文件或資料輸入建檔處理, 文件檔案資料處理、轉換及整合工作

cust_name: 環辰實業股份有限公司
job_detail:
1. 觀察機械的運作情形，偵測設備不足處或機械故障處，必要時須進行調整。
2. 閱讀藍圖或作業流程，用以決定產品規格和整修指導步驟，並規畫操作的順序。
3. 設立和操作車床、切割器、裁剪器、穿孔器、銑床、研磨器、壓榨機、鑽柄和輔助機械等機械設備，以製造出金屬和塑膠的機械零件。
4. 用人力或起重機擺放、調整與固定原料、零件或自動式機械，用以避免機械在操作過程中停止。
5. 檢查機械零件不足處，以確定機械操作的準確性。
6. 替換磨損的機械零件，如：切割器、手動工具等。
7. 進行細部的電子和機械維修、調整工作，如：潤滑及清潔機械和零件、在機械中添加冷卻劑等事宜。
skill: CNC加工機及相關機械操作

job_name: 手機配件門市銷售夥伴(八德店)
cust_name: 某3C手機配件館
job_detail:
【唯酷3C配件】
【熱誠親切的服務態度，３Ｃ配件專業的領導者 】
1. 於門市裡提供客人最親切的商品介紹及銷售服務。
2. 新手需熟練手機平板貼膜能力。
3. 負責店務經營領導及推動業績目標達成 。
4. 個性活潑、有親切笑容，學習與客戶保持良好的應對、歡樂的氣氛與親切的溝通。
5. 每日商品上架整理，店內外清潔整頓，商品搭配與拍攝，商品盤點庫存。

●工作態度積極、具有責任心、抗壓性高、肯學習。
●不隨意亂請假遲到，重視出席率。
●追求長期穩定的工作，並願與我們ㄧ同進步、成長者，歡迎您的加入。
●對於銷售商品到顧客手上，而您非常享受顧客滿意的成就感，我們歡迎您的加入。

【對手機通訊商品感興趣者佳】
【對銷售３Ｃ通訊配件感興趣者佳】

【基本工資＋獎金制度】

※ 必須喜歡打扮；喜歡與人互動交流；活潑有抗壓性！
※ 充滿學習的心；熱愛３Ｃ產品的穿著；善於搭配流行！
--
※ 本店擁有完善的薪資制度與獎金制度
language: 中文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通

休假制度：排班制
